name: Chicken Rendang
description: Rich, aromatic Malaysian curry with tender chicken and coconut milk

ingredients.name: Cardamom pods
ingredients.notes: smack with flat of knife to open

ingredients.name: Lemongrass stalks
ingredients.notes: trim off woody end and hard root part, slice very thinly

ingredients.name: Coconut milk
ingredients.notes: Use light if you want a healthier option

ingredients.name: Palm sugar
ingredients.notes: More if you like things in the sweet side

ingredients.name: Salt
ingredients.notes: Possibly omit if you follow the tweaks

ingredients.name: *** for the paste ***
ingredients.notes: The below ingredients are for the paste mix

ingredients.name: Palm sugar
ingredients.notes: More if you like things in the sweet side

ingredients.name: Lemon grass
ingredients.notes: trimmed and finely chopped as above

ingredients.name: Dried red chillies
ingredients.notes: depends on how hot you like it

instructions: Toast spices in dry pan for 30 seconds longer than recipe says
Blend shallots, galangal, chillies into paste
Add spice paste and fry until fragrant
Simmer on low heat for 1.5 hours until thick
our_changes: Add 1 tablespoons of fish sauce and 2 tablespoons of sweet soy sauce 5 minutes before end of cooking
Dried chillies can be subbed with chilli flakes
Optionally add a thumb sized piece of ginger to the paste
Stir in some coriander leaves just before removing from heat
notes: This one is addictive - make extra for leftovers!
